participants.name: Anjana Srinivasan
participants.title: Technical Recruiter with 5 Years' Experience in IT Recruitments

messages.message:
Amazon Recruiter waiting for you

Dear Brian, 

Hope you are doing good. This is regarding one of the hot SDE job requirement with Amazon Alexa team at Seattle,WA .

The Amazon Echo, powered by Alexa,www.amazon.com/echo<http://www.amazon.com/echo>, is a new category of device. It is designed around your voice and is hands-free and always on - ask it for information, music, news, and weather from across the room and get results or answers instantly.

I am interested in your background and would like to learn more about your interests with Amazon and move forward in interview process if qualified.

Please share your updated resume and contact number so that we could discuss more.

With regards,
Anjana Srinivasan,
Technical Recruiter
anjansri@amazon.com
Do you like recruiting for Amazon?
